The video was posted on Facebook on Nove: 2020, and shows hot water being poured over an apple, revealing a layer of white substance that can be peeled off.
The Thai: language caption of the video translates to English as: "You must peel apples every time before you eat. Look at this, it is a chemical coat called Paraffin, it will collect and gather in your intestines, which is dangerous."
Dr: Jessada Denduangboripant, a professor from the faculty of biology at Chulalongkorn University, confirmed that wax on an apple's surface is edible and can be safely consumed. He explained that if the wax cannot be broken down and absorbed by the body's digestive system, it will come out in excrement.
